subject: Re: [BLISS] Circling back to Woo Commerce Set Up

full_threads.body:
Hi Casey, 

The form is now rendering in a more tidy way. Regarding the thank you page, it appears the plugin is designed to load the 'thank you' message below the form. We can look further into it if you like, but it will likely be a bit of dev exploration and work. So I wanted to check in with you first.

Hi Heath,

Just checking in on these couple queries from a couple days ago.

Thanks :)

Casey

Casey

If not, can you please let us know how the page should be structured and the copy etc. so that we can create it. 

Feel free to give me a call tomorrow on 0415 162 271 if easier to run through over the phone.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath & team,

How have you been? It's been a minute since we were in touch.

We are preparing to launch Tara's main program, Rebels of Light, into the world again this year and would love to utilise the WooCommerce set up you created for us last year before all things went awry. I'm not sure if we're already 'there' in terms of what we need but here's the requirements:
  • Upfront fee
  • Payment plan - straightforward 6 month plan, one payment per month
  • Affiliates (ambassadors) - I think we might need an additional add on for this
Need to have these connect to Active Campaign and Active Member 360 please :)

The official launch date is penned in for June 7th but we're thinking of doing a pre-sale beforehand.

If it's easier to do a call to run through all this let me know (I might just have a wee one napping next to me).

Note: I'll aim to respond from the rebels@tarabliss.com.au email for this one moving forward to keep the organisation in one spot.

Cheers,
Casey

BLISS SUPPORT

e. support@tarabliss.com.au
w. tarabliss.com.au

Courage | Creation | Collaborative Leadership

doTERRA Presidential Diamond | Author | 'Rebels of Light'
